name: Acceptance Letter
template:
The Registrar,
University Of Nigeria Nsukka,
Enugu state.


Dear Sir,

ACCEPTANCE OF ADMISSION

I, <%= acceptance.fullName %> of <%= acceptance.lga %> LGA in <%= acceptance.state %> State of Nigeria hereby accept the offer of admission into the University of Nigeria, Nsukka to pursue a <%= acceptance.studentType %> course <%= acceptance.department %> in the faculty of <%= acceptance.faculty %> under the condition stipulated in your letter of admission, reference No. <%= acceptance.refNo %> dated <%= acceptance.date %>. I accept to abide by all existing regulations and those that the University will make from time to time concerning fees, academic programmes and other University matters.

I accept that, if any time after admission, it is discovered that I do not possess any of the qualifications or satisfy other conditions, including entry requirements onwhich the admission was based, I shall withdraw from the University if and when I am required to do so.

I enclose herewith, a non-refundable acceptance fee of =N=25,000 (Twenty Five Thousand Naira only) in Bank Draft/ Money Order/ Crossed Postal Order/ Teller Number/ Cash or UNN Bursary Receipt No. <%= acceptance.receiptNo %>.




Yours Faithfully,
Signature of Candidate.
